CustomField.description: Don't fill this out unless you're using the included custom Rollup Logger and have set your Org Defaults Rollup Control's Rollup Logger Name to CustomObjectRollupLogger. Number of days to retain logs created. Defaults to 5
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Don't fill this out unless you're using the included custom Rollup Logger and have set your Org Defaults Rollup Control's Rollup Logger Name to CustomObjectRollupLogger. Number of days to retain logs created. Defaults to 5.
CustomField.label: Days Rollup Logs Retained (Plugins Only)
